title: NFTs as event-and transport tickets
description: Tickets are unique, need verification, are often traded on secondary markets and don't last long as souvenirs. Here improvement is possible.
solution: NFTickets will be a platform for minting, (re)sale & verification of tickets for concerts, museums, travels, events, etc. using Cardano NFTs
experience: I am a participant of the second Plutus Pioneer Cohort, and have started a successful NFT project on Cardano in april.
